You and Dr. Vivaldi cross the Great River andstart your trek to the Shining Mountains. Alongthe way your guide, Mopur, brings back moun-tain game, breadbush, and tanga. The air seems lighter and brighter than in thevalley of the Great River. Never have you felt sohappy as you do right nowâ€”hiking through theShining Mountains. But your Archpod guide grumbles and frets.He blinks and rubs his eyes.
